Title: Data Scientist / Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Position: Data Scientist / Machine Learning Engineer

Location: Cologne (2 days remote per week)

Salary: €55,000 - €60,000




Join a leading German comparison company as the first ML hire in Cologne, supported by a 10-member team in Munich.




Responsibilities:

Lead Data Science Initiatives: Develop the data science department, automate business processes, and deliver customized customer solutions.
Implement Solutions: Create ML services focused on recommendation systems, ranking, information extraction, and predictions. Handle conceptual design, data preparation, model training, evaluation, and deployment.
MLOps Management: Use frameworks like MLFlow for experiment management, enhancing our product with cloud technologies (AWS).
Innovate with AI: Stay current with ML advancements, exploring generative AI models like Transformers and ChatGPT.
Collaborate: Work closely with product managers, developers, and BI managers in a cross-disciplinary team.




Requirements:

Education: Excellent degree in data science, (business) informatics, mathematics, physics, or statistics.
Skills: Proficiency in AI/ML stacks (NLP, LLMs, computer vision), basic server and API architecture knowledge.
Languages: Strong German and English communication skills.

Show more

Position: Data Scientist / Machine Learning Engineer

Location: Cologne (2 days remote per week)

Salary: €55,000 - €60,000


Join a leading German comparison company as the first ML hire in Cologne, supported by a 10-member team in Munich.


Responsibilities:

  • Lead Data Science Initiatives: Develop the data science department, automate business processes, and deliver customized customer solutions.
  • Implement Solutions: Create ML services focused on recommendation systems, ranking, information extraction, and predictions. Handle conceptual design, data preparation, model training, evaluation, and deployment.
  • MLOps Management: Use frameworks like MLFlow for experiment management, enhancing our product with cloud technologies (AWS).
  • Innovate with AI: Stay current with ML advancements, exploring generative AI models like Transformers and ChatGPT.
  • Collaborate: Work closely with product managers, developers, and BI managers in a cross-disciplinary team.


Requirements:

  • Education: Excellent degree in data science, (business) informatics, mathematics, physics, or statistics.
  • Skills: Proficiency in AI/ML stacks (NLP, LLMs, computer vision), basic server and API architecture knowledge.
  • Languages: Strong German and English communication skills.

Title: Data Scientist (H/F)
Description:
Le groupe PRODEVAL, fondé il y a un peu plus de 30 ans, est le leader mondial de l’épuration membranaire et de la valorisation du biogaz issu de la méthanisation de déchets organiques.

Construit autour du monde agricole et d’un esprit de filière fort, nous disposons d’une expertise unique et d’un esprit de conquête. Nous nous positionnons comme un acteur clé pour apporter des solutions concrètes, pragmatiques et immédiates aux grands enjeux de demain dans le domaine des énergies renouvelables, de la souveraineté énergétique et de la mobilité verte.

Nous opérons sur 4 domaines d’activité industrielle interdépendante : l’épuration du biogaz, la mobilité verte (BioGNV, BioGNL), la liquéfaction du CO2, et le service à l’exploitant (maintenance, formation, etc.).

Avec près de 380 collaborateurs répartis sur plus de 4 pays, Prodeval est en forte croissance.

Poste

Au sein de la direction Corporate Strategy, vous rejoindrez une équipe pluridisciplinaire agile et propice à la synergie. Vous travaillerez en étroite collaboration avec les équipes techniques et commerciales pour comprendre leurs besoins et fournir des solutions basées sur des données.

Vos Principales Missions Seront


Contribuer directement à la Stratégie Data du Groupe et à son déploiement, au service de l’amélioration de la Qualité et de la Performance
Identifier les données existantes et de nouvelles sources de données pertinentes à collecter pour enrichir la connaissance client et modéliser leur comportement (données internes ou externes, structurées ou non structurées).
Concevoir, développer et mettre en œuvre des modèles prédictifs et des algorithmes pour résoudre des problèmes d'affaires complexes.
Analyser de grands ensembles de données pour identifier des tendances, des modèles et des insights pertinents.
Concevoir et créer des tableaux de bord et des rapports pour visualiser les données et communiquer efficacement les résultats aux parties prenantes.
Participer à la veille technologique et rester à jour sur les dernières avancées en science des données et en intelligence artificielle.


CDI –Forfait 218 jours (RTT)

Salaire selon expérience + prime de participation

Basé à Valence TGV (Châteauneuf-sur-Isère)

Notre politique de recrutement est engagée en faveur des travailleurs en situation de handicap

Vous aurez accès aux infrastructures du campus (coach sportif, drive, CE, parking…).


BAC +5 en mathématiques ou statistiques, une thèse de doctorat (PhD) ou une expérience professionnelle dans un domaine lié aux bases de données, BI et Datamining / Analytics
Minimum 3 ans d’expérience
Capacité à développer des algorithmes et coder, notamment en Python
Connaissance des environnements cloud, idéalement AWS sur des sujets data, est un plus
Anglais courant obligatoire


C’est un plus si vous maitrisez le contrôle / la simulation de procédés, et les procédés de traitement et stockage de gaz (séparation, absorption, adsorption, compression, liquéfaction, lavage…),

Au-delà de votre expérience professionnelle, nous recherchons des personnes motivées, qui aient le sens de l'engagement et du service avec une sensibilité portée sur les énergies renouvelables.

Vous vous reconnaissez dans ce descriptif ? Rejoignez nos équipes !

A pourvoir au plus tôt
Show more

Construit autour du monde agricole et d’un esprit de filière fort, nous disposons d’une expertise unique et d’un esprit de conquête.   • Capacité à développer des algorithmes et coder, notamment en Python
  • Connaissance des environnements cloud, idéalement AWS sur des sujets data, est un plus
  • Anglais courant obligatoire

C’est un plus si vous maitrisez le contrôle / la simulation de procédés, et les procédés de traitement et stockage de gaz (séparation, absorption, adsorption, compression, liquéfaction, lavage…),

Au-delà de votre expérience professionnelle, nous recherchons des personnes motivées, qui aient le sens de l'engagement et du service avec une sensibilité portée sur les énergies renouvelables.

Vous vous reconnaissez dans ce descriptif ? Rejoignez nos équipes !

A pourvoir au plus tôt

Title: Data Scientist
Company: SR2 | Socially Responsible Recruitment | Certified B Corporation™
Description:
SR2 are partnered with a Global Data Consultancy, who are looking to on board Data Scientists.




In this role, you will leverage your expertise in data analysis and modelling to help their clients make informed, data-driven decisions. You will work on projects involving data collection, processing, and interpretation, turning complex data sets into actionable insights that drive business strategy. The ideal candidate will have strong analytical skills, proficiency in programming languages like Python or R, and experience with machine learning techniques.




Requirements:




Bachelor’s or Master’s in Computer Science, Mathematics, or related field.
Proficient in Python and ML frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, or scikit-learn.
Familiar with cloud platforms such as AWS.
Strong problem-solving, critical thinking, and communication skills.




Role

6-12+ month contract with high probability of extension
€80-90 p/h
Hybrid with occasional travel across North Rhine Region
Candidates have to be based in Germany
RTW in Germany required (no sponsorship)
2x Stage interview process




If you're passionate about using data to solve real-world business challenges, we'd love to hear from you.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
YTech is a 100% Portuguese technological startup with a presence in the area of IT and Telecom offering solutions in Consultancy, Nearshore, and Turnkey Projects. Created in 2020, it has over 80 employees. We work side by side with our partners, relying on the most solid professionals in the technological area.




💻Machine Learning Operations




Advise and guide the team on how to automate and optimize the deployment of AI-powered applications.
Develop, deploy, maintain and continually improve AI-powered applications and ML pipelines, which might include multiple components, such as data ingestion and transformation, model training and serving, frontend interfaces, databases and APIs.
Implement continuous integration and delivery (CI/CD) for our AI solutions
Monitor model performance and data quality, and iterate on models in production.
Ensure the scalability and reliability of our AI and ML infrastructure.




🚀 Our vision is to innovate and reinvent through technology services promoting the success of businesses and people

🚀 Our mission is to connect clients with outstanding experts and specialists to make businesses thrive

🚀 Our culture is focused on people and their well-being, allows talent retention, and promotes a strong cultural footprint




Join Ytech team by sending your CV to 📩 hirodrigues@ytech.io

  • Implement continuous integration and delivery (CI/CD) for our AI solutions
  • Monitor model performance and data quality, and iterate on models in production.
  • Ensure the scalability and reliability of our AI and ML infrastructure.


🚀 Our vision is to innovate and reinvent through technology services promoting the success of businesses and people

🚀 Our mission is to connect clients with outstanding experts and specialists to make businesses thrive

🚀 Our culture is focused on people and their well-being, allows talent retention, and promotes a strong cultural footprint


Join Ytech team by sending your CV to 📩 hirodrigues@ytech.io

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
En Verne Technology Group contamos con un equipo de personas dinámicas y comprometidas con el desarrollo y transformación continua de nuestro entorno. Apostamos por ofrecer calidad y actualidad tecnológica a nuestros clientes para acompañarlos en su crecimiento 🚀




¿Te apasiona la tecnología y ayudar a solucionar problemas con ella? Si eres una persona que quiere seguir desarrollando su carrera profesional y quieres participar en un equipo lleno de retos tecnológicos y multidisciplinares… ¡te hemos encontrado! 🔍




Buscamos profesionales de ML con conocimientos sólidos en Databricks para ampliar nuestro equipo de Machine Learning en España ☁️💻







💼 Principales funciones




Realizar la extracción, transformación y carga de datos necesarios para su uso en modelos de machine learning.
Identificar y seleccionar las variables más relevantes para la construcción de modelos.
Diseñar, implementar y ajustar algoritmos para adaptarlos a problemas específicos.
Probar y validar la eficacia y precisión de los modelos de machine learning mediante técnicas de validación cruzada, ajuste de hiperparámetros y métricas de evaluación.
Realizar la puesta en producción de modelos de machine learning asegurando su escalabilidad y mantenimiento.
Supervisar el rendimiento de los modelos de machine learning en producción, realizar ajustes y mejoras cuando sea necesario.
Trabajar en equipo con otros/as profesionales, como científicos/as de datos, ingenieros/as de software y especialistas en dominios específicos, para desarrollar soluciones integrales.
Evaluar las últimas tendencias, técnicas y herramientas en el campo del machine learning y aplicar nuevos enfoques y tecnologías cuando sea apropiado.
Explicar y presentar los resultados y las implicaciones de los modelos de machine learning a los interesados y colaboradores no técnicos.







📑 Requisitos deseables




Experiencia en el desarrollo de soluciones de machine learning en la plataforma de Databricks. Desde la experimentación hasta la puesta en producción.
Fluidez en el desarrollo de consultas SQL.
Tener experiencia en el desarrollo de código pyspark.
Conocer y saber aplicar los principios de MLOps.
Estar familiarizado/a con Unity Catalog para la gobernanza, detección y control de versiones.
Experiencia en el registro de modelos y puesta en producción de modelos con MLFlow. Así como la monitorización de experimentos.
Desenvolverse en el uso de la librería Apache Spark MLlib.
Saber implementar el ajuste de hiperparámetros mediante Hyperopt.
Estar familiarizado/a con la nueva herramienta de Databricks Asset Bundles.







🎓 Estudios requeridos

Ciclo de grado superior y/o grado universitario.
Nivel de inglés B2.
Se valorará positivamente experiencia adicional en la plataforma de Azure Machine Learning.







🖊️ Experiencia requerida

Experiencia mínima de 2 años como ingeniero en proyectos de ML.







🌟 ¿Qué te ofrecemos?

Aprender y experimentar con las últimas tecnologías.
Tener una amplia flexibilidad horaria para poder conciliar tu mundo laboral y personal
Jornada intensiva de verano.
Disfrutar de interesantes beneficios sociales.
Oportunidades de crecimiento y aprendizaje, colaborando con equipos multidisciplinares aportando valor a los proyectos.







¿Te identificas con alguno de estos puntos? Si crees que este puesto está hecho para ti, envíanos tu solicitud y nuestro equipo se pondrá en contacto contigo para conocerte y comenzar tu viaje más Tech 🤓







👉 Conoce más acerca de nosotros en #WeAreTech

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Your mission

As a Data Scientist, your role revolves around taking on defined project tasks and actively contributing to the development and implementation of data science solutions within projects. This requires a deep understanding of client problems and our services. You will need to excel at breaking down tasks into actionable steps and presenting results effectively, often communicating with clients.

Key Duties


encompass performing and interpreting analysis, including the creation of visualizations and dashboards.
break down problems into actionable steps and solve assigned tasks.
establish and nurture relationships with immediate colleagues and client teams within specific projects.
timely updates on work progress are essential, necessitating clear communication with project managers, senior team members and line manager (György Kovács).
able to solve problems efficiently with minimal supervision, while adhering to best practices and company guidelines, is crucial.
contributing ideas to problem-solving sessions and understanding the broader context of related work are integral to your role.


Your profile


Solid experience in data analysis, machine learning, and domain-specific knowledge.
Ability to work autonomously and independently.
Proficiency in Python programming and data visualization.


Preferred Qualifications

Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Physics, Economics, or any other quantitative field.

Work Experience

Ideally, 2-3 years of relevant work experience - project assignments, ideally client or corporate projects, outside of academia.

Why us?

Imagine you are part of a project team of 3-5 experts where your work has a direct and measurable impact. We work hand-in-hand with innovative clients in the airline industry, leveraging ML/AI and cloud technologies to develop unique solutions.

You'll experience the satisfaction of seeing measurable results and receiving quick feedback on the aftermath.

We're all about solving real business problems, not just integration and maintenance.

With us, you'll dive deep into business insights and help shape the future of airline technology. You'll be at the forefront of industry innovation, working with forward-thinking customers and leveraging deep business insights to create truly unique solutions. You will have the opportunity to immerse yourself in the latest state-of-the-art technology..

About Us

At DAALab, we're passionate about building scalable solutions that integrate seamlessly and deliver impact at scale in production environments. As business and digital enthusiasts, we're adept at identifying new sources of value and delivering pragmatic solutions quickly. With a perfect balance of AI and HI, we specialise in helping our clients in the airline, hospitality, tourism and retail sectors make data-driven decisions and deliver AI-powered predictive analytics.
